content: this pattern along with three other patterns are charity squares designed to benefit a wonderful charity called online angels we have a goal of 1 500 squares won t you please help if you enjoy testing new patterns follow the link to my blog join as a follower and subscribe to emails using the google link in the top right corner to receive the postings for new testers wanted this is the quickest way to hear about openings for testers http //smoothfoxlover blogspot com happy crocheting
